resources.string: String can only contain numbers, brackets and these operators: \'+\', \'-\', \'*\', \'/\'.

This is a string calculator made as a test task for FocusStart courses.

(English localization was made for education purposes. App language depends on system language.)
Here are the features:

• Binary functions: +, -, *, / ;
• Unary function: - ;
• Arbitrary brackets nesting;
• If the input string has errors, corresponding error message will be displayed;

App made by Maltsev Michail.
E-mail: maltsevmicyou@gmail.com
String is incorrect: not enough operands for every operation.
